body.name: Slice Box Outdoor Electric Pizza Oven, Countertop Cooking, Heats Up to 750 Degrees, Digital Thermometer, Pizza Stone, and Pizza Peel Included, Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor Use - 64900
features: High Heat Performance: The Aspect Living Slice Box Outdoor Electric Pizza Oven boasts an impressive heating capability, reaching up to a scorching 725°F. Double metal heating lamp - Upper power:750W, Lower power:750W. Achieve the perfect balance of crispiness and tenderness in every slice, making your homemade pizzas rival those from your favorite pizzeria. Features adjustable feet so it can be leveled on any flat surface.

Outdoor and Indoor Versatility: Whether you're hosting a pizza night indoors or enjoying the great outdoors, the Slice Box Outdoor Electric Pizza Oven is your culinary companion. Fits in any outdoor space. Its versatile design ensures you can create delectable pizzas wherever the mood strikes. Water proof: IPX4. With 6ft Power Cord.

Pizza Maestro Kit: The Slice Box comes complete with essential tools to enhance your pizza-making experience. The package includes a premium pizza stone for even heat distribution, a convenient pizza peel for easy handling, an electric thermometer for precise temperature control, and a preheating lid to streamline your cooking process.

Protective Cover for Lasting Quality: Keep your Slice Box Outdoor Electric Pizza Oven in pristine condition with the included protective cover. Shield your investment from the elements and ensure it's always ready for your next pizza-making masterpiece.

Efficient Preheating Lid: The preheating lid accelerates the preheating process, saving you time and energy. Experience the convenience of a rapid warm-up, so you can transition swiftly from anticipation to the delightful aroma of baking pizza.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Pizza Oven at a Great Value
reviews.reviewText: This pizza oven comes with everything you need to become a backyard pizza chef. The oven is built solid, and has adjustable feet to ensure your oven is level for perfect heat distribution. Simple to opearate with dual tempurature cotrols to ensure proper heating. Simple operation, you can be ready to cook your pizza in minutes. Makes a nice crispy crust with perfectly cooked toppings in minutes. Great value for a well built pizza oven. Highly recommend!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Pizza Oven
reviews.reviewText: The Pizza Oven is very high quality and is definitely worth the money. It cooks pizza evenly, quickly and gives the dough a nice crispy crust. The included accessories make it much easier to prepare and cook your pizza. I also like the versatility of being able to use it indoors and outside as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pizza oven is great!
reviews.reviewText: Shipped quickly and packaged well. No assembly required and comes with everything you need except the pizza ( you do require batteries for the temperature gun). Heats to 750F! and makes a great pizza every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks fast and even
reviews.reviewText: This pizza oven is great for homemade pizza! And a fun family dinner night! It’s easy to use and cooks the pizza fast and evenly. We all made pizza with our topping choice and also tried cheesy bread that turned out great! We might try calzones next! The oven was easy to set up and start using! Came with instructions a recipe book and the temperature gun help regulate heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best surprise! Great pizza! Fast even heat and great quality.
reviews.reviewText: I never knew I'd want an electric pizza oven but this is fabulous! I love how fast it cooks and the pizza comes out perfect. Nice quality product and fits nicely on our countertop. I received this as a gift and now I'm sending it as a gift! Love my pizza oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome pizza oven!
reviews.reviewText: Awesome Friday night pizza time! Oven was wonderful. Pizza was made very fast and delicious. Love all the accessories and very easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great birthday gift for husband
reviews.reviewText: This is a great pizza oven. It gets superhot and makes a nice crispy on the bottom and bubbly on top. We have had loads of fun using it for pizza parties for kids and adults. very good quality, the stone and pizza peel are top notch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dough Re-Mi: Singing Praises for the Slice Box Pizza Oven
reviews.reviewText: As a family that cherishes homemade pizza nights, we found ourselves constantly struggling with achieving that perfect crust in a conventional oven. That's when we decided to purchase the Slice Box Electric Pizza Oven.The product arrived in a robust 44-pound package, ensuring everything was intact. The box contained the Electric Pizza Oven, a pizza stone, an oven door, a pizza peel, a laser thermometer, an outdoor cover, a recipe booklet, and a user manual. The oven itself required no assembly, while the pizza peel and oven door needed minimal setup—attaching the handles, which took no more than five minutes using the included tools.The Slice Box boasts a user-friendly design with two control knobs for the top heating element and the bottom element that heats the pizza stone. We appreciated the simplicity of this design, making it approachable even for beginners.Heating up to the recommended 675°F took around 20 minutes, easily monitored with the provided laser thermometer. Our first experiment was a frozen pizza which came out crispy and perfect in about 5 minutes. Following this, we cooked frozen soft pretzels that were ready in 2-3 minutes. We then proceeded to make our own pizzas, ranging from classic pepperoni and cheese to large supreme variations. Each pizza cooked beautifully within 5-6 minutes, depending on our crust preference. The process was straightforward: remove the oven door, slide in a pizza using the peel, replace the door, and then simply wait a few minutes before removing the pizza. The ease of use was remarkable.The Slice Box operates silently and cleaning up after use is a breeze. Its compact size allowed us to use it on the same table where we dined, adding to its convenience.Overall, the Slice Box Electric Pizza Oven has been a delightful addition to our kitchen appliances. Its ease of use, efficiency in cooking, and the quality of the pizzas produced make it a worthy investment. The only thing that might stop me from using this oven regularly is the unlikely event of growing tired of delicious homemade pizza. Highly recommended for anyone venturing into the world of home pizza making!
